item.title: UX Writing
item.description: Terminology Terminology Affinity Diagram Also called “affinity chart” or “affinity mapping” or “K-J method” or “thematic analysis”. It is a visual mapping of ideas into their natural relationships, often the output of a brainstorming session in a team. Card Sorting In UX researching, card sorting is a technique in which participants sort labels for content into larger categories. Thsi provides insight into how participants group a product’s content, how they associate different pieces of content, helping to design the information architecture.
